_readme2: INVESTORIQ - SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH FOR ALL INSTITUTIONAL ANALYSIS
_readme4: Edit this file to change ANY threshold, scenario, or education content.
_readme5: NO CODE CHANGES NEEDED - everything reads from here.

SHORT_COVERING.meaning: Shorts closing, NOT new longs entering

SHORT_SQUEEZE.name: Short Squeeze Setup
SHORT_SQUEEZE.interpretation: Shorts paying high funding (crowded). Whales long while retail is short. Squeeze imminent.
SHORT_SQUEEZE.recommendation: LONG now with tight stop. Target 5-10% move.
SHORT_SQUEEZE.education: When shorts pay high funding AND whales are opposite, shorts become fuel for explosive upside.

NEW_LONGS_WHALE_BULLISH.name: New Longs + Whale Bullish
NEW_LONGS_WHALE_BULLISH.conditions_text: OI Rising + Price Rising + Whales >= 55% Long
NEW_LONGS_WHALE_BULLISH.interpretation: Fresh buying WITH whale confirmation. Strong conviction setup.
NEW_LONGS_WHALE_BULLISH.recommendation: Enter LONG on pullbacks. Stop below recent swing low.
NEW_LONGS_WHALE_BULLISH.education: Ideal bullish scenario - new positions + institutional confirmation.

NEW_LONGS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.name: New Longs Entering
NEW_LONGS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.conditions_text: OI Rising + Price Rising + Whales Neutral
NEW_LONGS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.interpretation: Fresh buying but whales neutral. Valid signal, less conviction.
NEW_LONGS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.recommendation: LONG with smaller position. Add if whales turn bullish.
NEW_LONGS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.education: OI+Price signal valid but without whale confirmation - smaller size.

LONG_SQUEEZE.name: Long Squeeze Setup
LONG_SQUEEZE.interpretation: Longs paying high funding (crowded). Whales short. Dump imminent.
LONG_SQUEEZE.recommendation: SHORT now with tight stop. Target 5-10% move.
LONG_SQUEEZE.education: When longs pay high funding AND whales are opposite, longs become fuel for violent downside.

NEW_SHORTS_WHALE_BEARISH.name: New Shorts + Whale Bearish
NEW_SHORTS_WHALE_BEARISH.conditions_text: OI Rising + Price Falling + Whales <= 45% Long
NEW_SHORTS_WHALE_BEARISH.interpretation: Fresh selling WITH whale confirmation. Strong conviction setup.
NEW_SHORTS_WHALE_BEARISH.recommendation: Enter SHORT on bounces. Stop above recent swing high.
NEW_SHORTS_WHALE_BEARISH.education: Ideal bearish scenario - new positions + institutional confirmation.

NEW_SHORTS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.name: New Shorts Entering
NEW_SHORTS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.conditions_text: OI Rising + Price Falling + Whales Neutral
NEW_SHORTS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.interpretation: Fresh selling but whales neutral. Valid signal, less conviction.
NEW_SHORTS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.recommendation: SHORT with smaller position. Add if whales turn bearish.
NEW_SHORTS_NEUTRAL_WHALES.education: OI+Price signal valid but without whale confirmation - smaller size.

LONG_LIQUIDATION_WHALE_BULLISH.name: Whale Accumulation Zone
LONG_LIQUIDATION_WHALE_BULLISH.conditions_text: OI Falling + Price Falling + Whales >= 55% Long
LONG_LIQUIDATION_WHALE_BULLISH.interpretation: Retail longs liquidated while whales accumulate. Wealth transfer in progress.
LONG_LIQUIDATION_WHALE_BULLISH.recommendation: DON'T catch knife. WAIT for stabilization, then LONG.
LONG_LIQUIDATION_WHALE_BULLISH.education: Selling now = selling to whales at bottom. Wait for liquidations to finish.

SHORT_COVERING_WHALE_BEARISH.name: Weak Rally - Distribution
SHORT_COVERING_WHALE_BEARISH.conditions_text: OI Falling + Price Rising + Whales <= 45% Long
SHORT_COVERING_WHALE_BEARISH.interpretation: Rally is just short covering. Whales selling into it.
SHORT_COVERING_WHALE_BEARISH.recommendation: DON'T short immediately. WAIT for exhaustion, then SHORT.
SHORT_COVERING_WHALE_BEARISH.education: Retail sees rally and buys. Whales selling to them. Classic distribution.

SHORT_COVERING_NEUTRAL.name: Short Covering Rally
SHORT_COVERING_NEUTRAL.interpretation: Rally from short covering. Direction unclear.
SHORT_COVERING_NEUTRAL.recommendation: Wait for new positions to enter before taking direction.
SHORT_COVERING_NEUTRAL.education: Short covering rallies can be traps. Stay cautious.

LONG_LIQUIDATION_NEUTRAL.name: Long Liquidation Cascade
LONG_LIQUIDATION_NEUTRAL.interpretation: Longs liquidated, no whale support. Could continue or reverse.
LONG_LIQUIDATION_NEUTRAL.education: Forced selling without whale buying - don't catch the knife.

CONFLICTING_SIGNALS.name: Conflicting Signals
CONFLICTING_SIGNALS.interpretation: New positions vs whale positioning. Someone is wrong.
CONFLICTING_SIGNALS.recommendation: Small position or wait. Whales win ~60% of conflicts.
CONFLICTING_SIGNALS.education: When signals conflict, smart money is often early. Wait or follow whales.

NO_EDGE.name: No Clear Edge
NO_EDGE.interpretation: All metrics neutral. No conviction either direction.
NO_EDGE.recommendation: Use technical analysis only. Wait for extremes.
NO_EDGE.education: No institutional edge. Range trade or wait for catalyst.

WHALE_BULLISH_OI_NEUTRAL.name: Whale Bullish (OI Stable)
WHALE_BULLISH_OI_NEUTRAL.description: Whales positioned long, waiting for OI confirmation
WHALE_BULLISH_OI_NEUTRAL.action: Cautious long with OI confirmation, tight stops
WHALE_BULLISH_OI_NEUTRAL.education: Whales are bullish but no new money entering yet. Could be accumulation before a move.

WHALE_BEARISH_OI_NEUTRAL.name: Whale Bearish (OI Stable)
WHALE_BEARISH_OI_NEUTRAL.description: Whales positioned short, waiting for OI confirmation
WHALE_BEARISH_OI_NEUTRAL.action: Cautious short with OI confirmation, tight stops
WHALE_BEARISH_OI_NEUTRAL.education: Whales are bearish but no new shorts entering yet. Could be distribution before a drop.

oi_change.name: Open Interest
oi_change.what: Total number of open futures contracts
oi_change.why_matters: Shows if NEW money entering or positions closing
oi_change.edge: OI + Price together reveal WHO is entering/exiting

funding_rate.name: Funding Rate
funding_rate.what: Fee paid between longs and shorts

whale_positioning.name: Top Trader Positioning
whale_positioning.what: Position of top 20% traders by size
whale_positioning.why_matters: Smart money tends to be right
